\begin{entry}

\meaning{\arthanonum{iDiV jagatatxnunx oMdu yaMtarxveMdu BAvisidare, adanunx ADisuva parashivanu yaMtarxvAhaka\-nenisikoLuLxtAtxne. ililx `jagatutx' eMba padavanunx jaDa\-jagatutx eMdU, jiVvajagatutx eMdU atheYRsabeVku. EkeMdare parashivanu averaDanUnx tanagiceCx baMdaMte ADisutAtxne. ililx gamanisabeVkAda aMshaveVneMdare, yaMtarxdiMda hora\-gidudxkoMDu yaMtarxvAhakanu adanunx ADisuvaMte, parashivanu jagatitxna oLagidudxkoMDeV jagatatxnunx niyaMtirxsutAtxne:}

shivaBakatxru rudArxkaSxvanunx nitayx dharisuvudariMda avara elalx pApagaLu nAshavAgutatxve. rudArxkiSxgaLu visheVSavAgi kAshimxVra, neVpALa matutx himAlaya parxdeVshagaLalilx beLeyuva oMdu bageya maradalilx biDutatxve:}}

\ullekha{maneyoLagana joyxVti maneya muTaTxdaMte... ivelalx AyataMgaLalalxde pArxNaliMgasathxLa beVre (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 410-125); liMgasathxLa: 1. idu liMgasathxLaM tAneMdiduve varajaMgamasathxLaveMdu tadivxmaLa parxsAdasathxLamideMda{\ru}pi ...manujaranelalxraM nijaBakitxyukitxyali pAvanatavxvanitutx pAlisi kAvudu (basapu. 1-59).}

\begin{entry}

\ullekha{``shAsatxrXda vacana:  hoVtiMge mAri'' (savasaM. 1; basava. 572-144)}
\artha{diTavAda mAtu:} \ullekha{kUDala saMgana vacanaviMteMdudu: ``shavxpa\-coVpiyAdaDeVnu, shivaBakatxneV kulajaM, BoV'' (savasaM. 1; basava. 589-147)}

\artha{Ajecnx:}
\ullekha{``iMteMbudu Adayxra vacana''.}

\ullekha{``avaLa vacana belalxdaMte'' haqdayadalilx puTidu naMju kaMDayAyx (savasaM. 1; basava. 110-30).}}

\begin{entry}

\meaning{\artha{paMcamahABUtagaLalilx oMdu. mUvatAtxru tatatxvXgaLalilx oMdu. kaMpana, BarxmaNa, shoVSaNa (oNagisuvudu), veVgavAgi calisuva matutx sapxshaRguNagaLiMda kUDiruva mahA\-BUta. idu AkAshadiMda huTiTx, aginxyanunx huTiTxsu\-vaMtahadudx:}}

\begin{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyudhAraNe}
\meaning{\arthanonum{vAyugaLalilx hadinAlukx vidha, avugaLalilx aidu muKayxvAduvu. A aidaralilx oMdeV
vAyu muKayx. adu \hbox{deVhada} elalx kaDegaLalUlx calisutitxdudx,
pArxNAyAmada mUlaka (pUraka, reVcaka, kuMBakagaLa mUlaka)
adanunx barxhamxnADiyalilx nililxsuvudeV vAyudhAraNe. idu AyuSayxvaqdidhx
mADuvudalalxde, namamx jAcnxnashakitxyanunx hecicxsi, parashivanoMdige
beLe\-yalu sahAyakavAguvudu:}
\ullekha{inunx vAyudhAraNe eMteMdaDe: catudaRshavAyugaLoLu paMcavAyuve muKayxvAgihudu (savasaM. 13; bAlasaM. 279-120); vAyudhAraNe mahAvAyuvanu piDidu samacitatxnAgi mUlajAvxleyanebibxsuvudu (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 149-379).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyoVH dhAraNaM - vAyudhAraNaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}
\word{vAyupaMcaka}
\meaning{\artha{karaNahasigeya paMciVkaqtigaLalilx oMdu paMcaka; vAyuvina paMciVkaraNadiMda deVhatatatxvXdalilx parxkaTagoMDa aidara oMdu guMpu:}
\ullekha{pariva, pAruva, suLiva, niluva, agaluva - I aidu vAyupaMcaka (savasaM. 4; \hbox{sidadhxrA.} 1005-282); hiMgeV vAyupaMcaka\-dalilxyU liMgaveV sAvxyatavAgipupxdayayx (savasaM. 11; toVMTasi. 335-157); vAyupaMcakaMgaLa tiruLanuruhi tananxnariyabalAlxtaneV sharaNa (savasaM. 12; deVshikeVM. 695-209).}
\artha{shariVradalilx parxdhAnavAgiruva pArxNa, apAna, vAyxna, udAna matutx samAna eMba paMcavAyugaLu:}
\ullekha{BUtapaMcaka vAyupaMcaka iMdirxya\-dashaka karaNacatuSaTxyaMgaLenipa catuviRMshati\-tatatxvX haMtahadiVga deVha (karaNa. 664-7); samAnoVdAnavA vAyxnamaMtapAnaM pArxNavu I vAyupaMcakamuM ...niVna{\ri}vudeY paMcashakitxsavxrUpaveY (viVsheYpu. 14-7-100).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{vAyUnAM paMcakaM - vAyupaMcakaM}}
\end{entry}

\begin{entry}

\smallskip
\begin{shl}

\begin{entry}

devxYtAdevxYtamateV shudedhxV visheVSAdevxYtasaMjacnxkeV |\\[1pt]

\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(shirxV. BA., BA-1, BUmike. sholxV. 15)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shirxV niVlakaMTha shivAcAyaRru viVrasheYva sidAdhxMtavanunx `shivAdevxYta' eMdu parxtipAdisidAdxre. idakekx shakitxvishiSATxdevxYta, visheVSAdevxYta, SaTfsathxla-liMgAMga sAmarasayx, shivayoVga, mahApAshupata eMba hesarugaLU ive. shivAgamagaLalilx I elalx hesarugaLiMda kUDiruva I sidAdhxMtavanunx `viVrasheYva' hesariniMda kareyutAtxre. `viV' eMba akaSxravu shiva-jiVvada aikayxboVdhakavAda videyxyanunx boVdhisutatxde. aMtaha videyxyalilx `ra' ramisatakakx (AnaMdisatakakx) yAva sheYva\-ruMToV avareV `viVrasheYva'renisutAtxre. shivAdevxYta eMdare shivanalilx oMdAguvike. parashivaceYtanayxvu tananx icACxshakitxya vashadiMda malatarxyagaLa saMbaMdhadiMda shariVratarxyagaLanunx (sUthxla-sUkaSxmX-kAraNa) hoMdi, kaTiTxgeya beMkiyu aneVka kiDigaLAgi AviBaRvisuvaMte anaMta jiVvarugaLa BAravanunx hoMdu\-tatxde. tananx neYja savxrUpavanunx maremAcikoMDiruva parashiva ceYtanayxvu tananxlilxya shakitxvikAsadiMdAgi malatarxyagaLanunx dUramADi\-koLuLxva kAraNa shariVratarxyada saMbaMdhavanunx kaLedukoMDu, nadigaLu samudarxdalilx liVnavAguvAga tamamx tamamx hesaru, rUpagaLanunx kaLedukoLuLxva hAge, tananx mUlasavxrUpavAda AnaMdarasadalilx liVnavAgi tAneV tAnAgi Agutatxde. jiVvaru shivanalilx seVruva I parxkirxyeyeV `shivAdevxYta':}}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
viVshabedxVnoVcayxteV vidAyx shivajiVveYkayx boVdhiniV |\\[1pt]
tasAyxM ramaMteV yeV sheYvAH viVrasheYvAH parxkiVtiRtAH |
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(si.shi. 5.16)}
\smallskip
\begin{shl}
shivAdevxYtamitayxtarx...savxyameVva BavatiVti |
\end{shl}
\smallskip
\pauthor{(shivA.pa. parxka.-9, ga.BA.-4, pu. 100-101)}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad viVrasheYvadalilx padeV padeV baruva `shivAdevxYta' eMba padakekx ``devxYtAdevxYta" athavA ``shakitxvishiSATxdevxYta" eMba athaRvanunx koDabahudu. shivAdevxYta eMdare iruvavanu shivanobabxneV eMba sidAdhxMta. hAgAdare, aneVka BwtavasutxgaLiMda kUDida jagatUtx aneVka jiVvigaLU iveyalalx eMba saMdeVha barutatxde. shaMkarAcAyaRra cidadevxYtada parxkAra barxhamxnobabxneV satayx, AtamxgaLa aneVkateyU BwtaparxpaMcavU asatayx. Adare viVrasheYvada shivAdevxYta eMdare, AtamxgaLU jagatUtx asatayx alalx, avu shivanoLageV aDagirutatxve. jiVva jagatutx matutx Ishavxrara naDuvaNa saMbaMdhavanunx viVrasheYvadalilx samudarx matutx noreteregaLa saMbaMdhakekx hoVlisalAgide. samudarxvilalxdidadxre, teregaLU noreyU iralu sAdhayxvilalx. samudarxveV avugaLa asitxtavxkekx kAraNa. hAgeyeV parashivaneV ilalxdidadxre, jagatutx jiVvagaLu irutitxralilalx. EkeMdare, avugaLu avaniMda vayxkatxvAgutatxve. eraDaneyadAgi, teregaLU noreyU samudarxda oMdu avasethx. avugaLa rUpa AkAra badalAgabahudu. Adare avugaLa AdhAra badalAguvudilalx. hAgeyeV jiVva jagatutx parashivana vividha avasethxgaLu, avugaLa nAmarUpagaLu badalAgabahudAdarU, avugaLa AdhAra mAtarx parashivaneV. athavA Bititx oMdaralilx beVre beVre kAlagaLalilx beVre beVre citarxgaLanunx heVge racisabahudoV, hAgeyeV parashivaneMba AdhArada meVle beVre beVre kAlagaLalilx beVre beVre jagatutxgaLu beVre beVre jiVvarAshigaLU kANisikoLaLxbahudu.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad idariMda vayxkatxvAguva aMshavidu: noreyataraMgagaLu samudarxdiMda BinanxvAgirade, adara aMgagaLAgiruva hAgeyeV, jiVva jagatutx parashivaniMda BinanxvAgirade avana aMga(BAga)vAgive. AdudariMda nijavAgi, shivanobabxneV iruvavanu. I sidAdhxMtaveV shivAdevxYta:}
\ullekha{liMgavu keYlAsada shivana kuruhAdudariMda pUjayxveMbaru: sharaNanu manuja\-nAdudariMda avanu pUjakaneMbaru. iMtiV \hbox{keVvala} BeVda\-saMbaMdha kalipxsuva BavaBArigaLu shivAdevxYtakekx dUravAgipapxru kaMDA (savasaM. 3; cenanxba. 1335-472); shivAdevxYtajAcnxnadalilxyalalxde AtAmxdevxYtajAcnxnadalilx mUla avideyx keDedu noVDayAyx (savasaM. 6; Adayayx. 1028-317).}}
\newmeaning{\ni{shivayoVH adevxYtaM - shivAdevxYtaM}}
\end{entry}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad viVrasheYvadalUlx mUru parxBeVdagaLive. aveMdare sAmAnayx, visheVSa matutx nirABAri. hasatxmasatxka saMyoVgavanonxLagoMDa diVkeSxya mUlaka viVrasheYvanAdavanu sAmAnayx viVrasheYva. avanu paMcAkaSxrimaMtarxdiMda diVkeSx paDedu utatxmAMgAdi yAvudAdarU sAthxnadalilx iSaTxliMgavanUnx viBUtiyanUnx dharisutAtxne, hAgU, parxti dina oMdu sAri, sAdhayxvAdare eraDu sAri, sAdhayxvAdare mUru sAri adanunx pUjisutAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shudadhxviVrasheYvaru mADuva diVkASxvidhAnavanunx anusarisi, shivakuMBavanunx sAthxpisi, adaralilxruva shivananunx pUjisi, diVkoSxVtasxvakekx baMdiruva oDeyarugaLanunx saMtuSaTxgoLisuva saluvAgi avarige viBUti viVLeyavanunx koDuvavanu visheVSa viVrasheYva. avanu guru heVLida elalx diVkASxkamaRgaLanunx mADuvudalalxdeV tananx malatarxyagaLanUnx nimURlana mADikoLuLxtAtxne. shivAcAyaRnu aMtha visheVSa viVrasheYva shiSayxnanunx kaqpAdaqSiTxyiMda noVDi, avana deVhavanunx citf shariVravanAnxgi mADutAtxne. anaMtara diVkiSxtanu SaTfcakarx, SaDaMga matutx SaDadhavxgaLanunx jAgaqtagoLisutAtxne. visheVSa viVrasheYvanu tananx deVha matutx pArxNa beVrAgada hAge vatiRsutAtxne, aMdare avanu liMgadalilx pArxNavaninxrisi tananx elalx kelasa matutx ciMtanegaLanunx liMgABimuKavAgi mADutAtxne.}}

AcAradalilx AcAraliMga, AcAradalilx guruliMga, AcAradalilx shivaliMga, AcAradalilx jaMgamaliMga, AcAradalilx parxsAdaliMga, AcAradalilx mahAliMga. hiVgAdare Bakatxnu AcAraliMgavanunx sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxvudeMdare, Aru liMgagaLanUnx sAkASxtakxrisikoLuLxvudeMdathaR. hAge sAkASxtakxrisikoLaLxlu avanu Bakatxsathxladalilx naDedukoMDaMte naDedukoMDare sAladu, adara jotege uLida aidU sathxlagaLa sAdhakanaMte AcarisabeVkAgutatxde. adu heVgeMbu\-danunx SaDivxdha AcAraliMgada parikalapxneyu tiLisutatxde. \begin{entry}

\src{va}
\meaning{\arthanonum{namamx jAcnxneVMdirxya matutx kameRVMdirxyagaLu shakitxya vividha rUpAMtaragaLu. parxtiyoMdu iMdirxyadalilxyU oMdoMdu liMgavidudx, A liMga\-gaLU saha parashivana vividha avataraNikegaLAgive. shakitxya vividha rUpAMtaragaLalilxruva liMgada vividha avataraNike\-gaLanunx sAdhakanu vividha haMtagaLalilx olisikoLuLxtAtxne. idanenxV vacanakAraru SaDivxdha liMgadhAraNe eMdu karedidAdxre. yAva haMtadalilx yAva liMgavanunx olisikoLaLxbeVkeMbudakekx vivara.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{paqthivxtatatxvXvu GArxNeVMdirxya matutx gudagaLAgi vikasitagoMDide. alilx nivaqtitxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide. A kaleyalilx kirxyAshakitxyutavAda AcAraliMgavidudx, sAdhakanu adanunx Bakatxsathxladalilx dharisi, BakatxnenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{jihevx matutx guhayx apf tatatxvXda vikasita rUpagaLu. alilx parxtiSAThxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx jAcnxnashakitxyutavAda guruliMga idudx, adanunx dharisida sAdhakanu maheVshanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{neVtarx matutx pAdagaLu aginxtatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avugaLalilx vidAyxkaleyeMba Bakitx ide, adaralilx icACxshakitxyutavAda shivaliMga idudx, adanunx dharisidavanu parxsAdiyenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{tavxkukx matutx pANigaLu vAyutatatxvXda rUpAMtara. avugaLalilx shAMtikalA eMba Bakitxyide. adaralilx Adishakitx\-yuta\-vAda jaMgamaliMgavidudx adanunx dharisidavanu pArxNaliMgi enisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{shorxVtarx matutx vAgiMdirxyagaLu parAshakitxya beVre rUpagaLu. avugaLalilx shAMtayxtiVta kaleyeMba Bakitxyidudx, adaralilx parAshakitxyutavAda parxsAdaliMgavidudx, adanunx dharisikoMDAta sharaNanenisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\artha{Atamx eMba aMgakekx manasesxMba cicaCxkitxrUpada \hbox{shakitxyidudx}, adaroLage shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra kale eMba Bakitx ide, adaralilxruva cicaCxkitxyutavAda mahAliMgavanunx dharisidavanu aikayx nenesikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{meVle heVLida Aru liMgagaLu manuSayxna karaNeVMdirxyagaLalilx AgaleV ive. avanunx hosadAgi avanu iSaTxliMgadaMte dharisabeVkAgilalx. avanalilx iruva shakitxgaLeV A liMgagaLanunx \hbox{mucicxve}. sAdhakanu kalegaLeMba BakitxgaLa sahAyadiMda, A shakitxgaLanunx pAradashaRka mADi, avugaLalilxruva liMgavanunx noVDidare, liMgadhAraNe mADidaMteyeV. shakitxgaLanunx pAradashaRka mADuvudeMdare, avugaLa duguRNagaLanunx tegedu, avugaLa duvaRtaRneyanunx taDedu, avugaLanunx AdhAyxtimxka udedxVshakAkxgi baLasikoLuLxvudu (va.pa.koV. 381).}
\ullekha{iMtiV SaDusathxla Bakatxru \hbox{SaDivxdha} liMgava dharisi nirALaliMgAcaRneya mADutitxharu (savasaM. 11; savxtaMtarx 856-435)}}
\newmeaning{\ni{SaDivxdhaM ca tatatf liMgadhAraNaM ca - SaDivxdhaliMgadhAraNaM}}

EkeMdare parxsAdada nijavAda athaR iSaTxkekxV siVmitavAgilalx. nAvu iMdirxyagaLa mUlaka EneVnanunx anuBavisutetxVveyoV avelalxvanUnx parxsAdaveMbaMteyeV sivxVkarisabeVku. \newmeaning{\artha{kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx matutx veVdhAdiVkeSx paDeda \hbox{sahaja} Bakatxru tamamx shariVrada mUvatAtxru sAthxnagaLalilx viBUtiyanunx dharisabeVku. hAge mADidare avarige sacicxdAnaMda pada doreyutatxde.}}

\newmeaning{\artha{koneyadAgi, kirxyAdiVkeSx, maMtarxdiVkeSx, veVdhAdiVkeSx, sacicxdAnaMdadiVkeSx matutx nivARNapadadiVkeSxgaLanunx paDeda sadaBxkatxru tamamx aMgada nAlavxtetxMTu sAthxnagaLalilx maMtarxvanunx paThisutAtx viBUtidhAraNe mADabeVku, hAge mADidare avarige, jaMgamaroDanATa matutx parashivanoDane kUTa uMTAgi, koneyalilx niravaya samAdhi uMTAgutatxde (va.pa.koV. 382):}

\begin{entry}
\word{SaDivxdhasamapaRNe}

\meaning{\arthanonum{Bakatxnu tanage baMda padAthaR\-gaLanunx guruliMgajaMgamakUkx, puSapx modalAda sugaMdhavasutxgaLanunx AcAraliMgakUkx samapiRsabeVku. haNuNx modalAda rasaBarita vasutxgaLanunx maheVshanu guruliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; piVta, shevxVta muMtAda vasAtxrXdigaLanunx, aMdare avugaLa rUpanunx, pArxsAdiyu shivaliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; kwpiVna, uDudAra muMtAda yAvAgalU namamxnunx muTuTxtitxruva padAthaR\-gaLanunx (aMdare, sapxshaRnavanunx) pArxNaliMgiyu tananx satikxrXyegaLa mUlaka jaMgamaliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; shabodxV\-tApxdaka vasutxgaLAda gaMTe, taMtivAdayxgaLu muMtAda vasutxgaLanunx (aMdare shabadxvanunx) sharaNanu parxsAdaliMgakekx samapiRsabeVku; koneyadAgi, aikayxnu tanenxlalxvanUnx mahAliMgakekx samapiRsi, paripUNaR taqpitx paDeyabeVku.}}

\meaning{\artha{paMceVMdirxyagaLu, paMcakameRVMdirxyagaLu, citatx, manasusx, ahaMkAra, videyx, vAkukx matutx shakitxgaLeMba hadinAru parxkAragaLu.}

AdudariMda, avanu gaMdhavanunx barxhamx\-nige aMdare, parashivana kamaRsAdAKayxdalilxruva GArxNaveMba bAyige, tananx sucitatxveMba hasatxdiMda apiRsi, sugaMdhaveMba parxsAdavanAnxgi mADikoLuLxtAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge pUji\-suva Bakatxnu barxhamxpUjAriyenisikoLuLxtAtxne. idu sUthxla keYyanunx upayoVgisi, sUthxla vasutxgaLanunx apiRsi, sUthxla parxsAdagaLanunx sivxVkarisuva pUjeyalalx eMbudanunx nAvu gamanadalilxDabeVku.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad iMtha sUkaSxmX pUjeya deseyiMdAgi, Bakatxnu anuBAvadalilx tananx AdhAradalilxruva kuMDaliyanunx jAgaqtagoLisi, alilxruva jiVvAtamxnanUnx, AdhArada pUvaRdikikxnalilxruva satf eMba lakaSxNa\-vanUnx, paraveMba saMjecnxyanUnx, tArAkAkaqtiyanUnx, piVtavaNaRvanUnx, veVNunAdavanUnx anuBavisutAtxne. idariMda paqthivxV tatatxvXvu shudadhxvAgi nivaqtitxkaleyenisikoLuLxtatxde; hAgU avanige QugevxVda\hbox{jAcnxnavu} laBisutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad eraDaneya sathxla: maheVshasathxla, niSAThxBakitx; sAvxdhiSAThxnacakarx, guru\-liMga, sUkaSxmXtanu, subudidhx hasatx, apupxve aMga; rasa \hbox{padAthaR}, surasa parxsAda; jihevx muKa, viSuNx pUjAri, viSuNx adhideVvate; daMDAkaqti, makAra parxNama, GaMTAnAda, shevxVtavaNaR, pashicxma dikukx, yajuveRVda; aMtarAtamx; jAcnxnashakitx, parxtiSAThxkale; kataqR sAdAKayx, citatxveMba lakaSxNa, gUDha eMba saMjecnx.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad maheVshasathxladalilxruvavana sUkaSxmXtanuvu paMcaBUtagaLiMda mADalapxTiTxdadxrU, avana sAvxdhiSAThxnacakarxkekx apftatatxvXveV \hbox{parxdhAna}; rasaveV parxdhAna guNavuLaLx apf tatatxvXvu jAcnxnashakitxya matotxMdu rUpavAgidudx, adakekx viSuNxveV adhideVvate; sAvxdhiSAThxna cakarxda madhayxdalilx guruliMgavide; aMdare, parashivana kataqRsAdAKayxdalilxruva jihevx eMba bAyige, tananx subudidhx eMba sUkaSxmX hasatxdiMda rasaveMba padAthaRvanunx apiRsi, surasaveMba parxsAdavanunx paDeyutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge pUjisuva Bakatxnu viSuNxpUjAri enisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sUkaSxmXhasatxdiMda mADuva iMtha pUjeyiMdAgiyU surasa eMba parxsAdavanunx seVvisidudariMdAgiyU maheV\-shanu sAvxdhiSAThxna cakarxdalilxruva guruliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu aMtarAtamxveMdu tiLidu, sAvxdhiSAThxnada pashicxma dikikxnalilxruva citetxMba lakaSxNavanUnx, gUDhaveMba cihenx\-yanUnx, daMDAkaqtiyanUnx, shevxVtavaNaRvanUnx, GaMTAnAdavanUnx anuBavisi AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi sAvxdhiSAThxnada apf tatatxvXvu shudadhxvAgi muMde adu parxtiSAThx kaleyenisikoLuLxtatxde. aMtha Bakatxnige yajuveRVdada jAcnxnavuMTAgutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad mUraneya sathxla: parxsAdi sathxla, kuMDalAkaqti, shikAra parxNama, BeVri nAda, maNipUraka cakarx, harita vaNaR, kAraNatanu, nirahaMkAra hasatx, shivaliMga, neVtarx muKa, sAvadhAna \hbox{Bakitx}, \hbox{surUpu} padAthaR, surUpu parxsAda, rudarx pUjAri, rudarxnadhi\-deVvate, mUtiR sAdAKayx, AnaMdaveMba lakaSxNa, shariVrasathxveMba saMjecnx, utatxra dikukx, sAmaveVda, aginxyeV aMga, paramAtamx, icACxshakitx, vidAyxkale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad parxsAdisathxladalilxruvavana kAraNa tanuvinalilxruva maNipUraka cakarxkekx aginxtatatxvXveV parxdhAna; rUpaveV parxdhAna guNavuLaLx aginxtatatxvXvu icACxshakitxya matotxMdu rUpavAgidudx adakekx rudarxneV adhideVvate; maNipUraka cakarxda madhayxdalilx shivaliMgavide; aginxtatatxvXkekx rUpaveV parxdhAna guNavAdudariMda parxsAdiyu adanunx rudarxnige (aMdare parashivana mUtiRsAdAKayxdalilxruva neVtarx\-veMba bAyige), tananx nirahaMkAraveMba sUkaSxmX hasatxdiMda apiRsi, surUpu eMba parxsAdavanunx paDeyutAtxne; parashiva\-nanunx hiVge pUjisuva sAdhakanu rudarxneMba pUjAri enisikoLuLxtAtxne.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sUkaSxmX hasatxdiMda mADuva pUje matutx surUpu parxsAdigaLiMdAgi, parxsAdiyu maNipUraka cakarxdalilxruva shivaliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu paramAtamxneMdu tiLidu, maNi\-pUraka cakarxda utatxra dikikxnalilxruva AnaMdaveMba lakaSxNavanUnx, shariVrasathxveMba saMjecnxyanUnx, kuMDalAkaqtiyanUnx, haritavaNaRvanUnx, BeVrinAdavanUnx anuBavisi AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi maNipUraka cakarxvanunx sututxvarida icACxshakitxyu shudadhxvAgi muMde adu vidAyxkale enisikoLuLxtatxde. aMtha sAdhakanige sAmaveVda sididhxsutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad nAlakxneya sathxla : pArxNaliMgisathxla, adhaRcaMdArxkaqti, vakAraparxNama, meVGanAda, anAhatacakarx, mAMjiSaThxvaNaR, nimaRla\-tanu, sumanahasatx, jaMgamaliMga, tavxkf eMba muKa, anuBAva Bakitx, susapxshaRnapadAthaR, susapxshaRna parxsAda; Ishavxra pUjAri, IshavxranadhideVvate; amUtiRsAdAKayx, nitayxveMba lakaSxNa, liMgakeSxVtarx eMba saMjecnx, dakiSxNa dikukx, athavaRveVda, vAyuveV aMga, nimaRlAtamx, Adishakitx, shAMtikale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad pArxNaliMgi sathxladalilxruvavana anAhatacakarxvanunx vAyutatatxvXvu sututxvaredide. sapxshaRveV parxdhAnaguNavuLaLx vAyutatatxvXvu Adishakitxya matotxMdu rUpavAgidudx adakekx IshavxraneV adhideVvate; I cakarxda madhayxdalilx jaMgamaliMgavide; vAyuvige sapxshaRveV parxdhAna guNavAdudariMda pArxNaliMgiyu adanunx Ishavxranige aMdare, parashivana amUtiRsAdAKayx\-dalilxruva tavxkf eMba bAyige, tananx nimaRlatanuvina sumana eMba sUkaSxmXhasatxdiMda apiRsi, susapxshaRveMba parxsAda\-vanunx BoVgisutAtxne; parashivananunx hiVge pUjisuva sAdhakananunx IshavxrapUjAriyeMdu kareyalAgutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I pUjeya naMtara, pArxNaliMgiyu anAhata cakarxdalilxruva jaMgamaliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu nimaRlAtamxneMdu aritu, A cakarxda dakiSxNa dikikxnalilxruva nitayxveMba lakaSxNavanUnx, liMgakeSxVtarxveMba saMjecnxyanUnx, adhaRcaMdArxkaqti\-yanUnx, mAMjiSaThx vaNaRvanUnx, meVGanAdavanUnx anuBavisi, AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi, anAhatacakarxvanunx sututxvarida Adishakitxyu shudadhxvAgi, muMde adu shAMtikale enisikoLuLxtatxde; aMtha sAdhakanige athavaRveVda sididhxsutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad aidaneya sathxla: sharaNasathxla, dapaRNAkaqti, yakAra parxNama, parxNava\-nAda, vishudidhxcakarx, kapoVtavaNaR, AnaMda tanu, sujAcnxna hasatx, parxsAdaliMga, shorxVtarxveMba muKa, AnaMda Bakitx, sushabadx padAthaR, sushabadx parxsAda, sadAshiva pUjAri, sadAshivaneMba adhideVvate, shivasAdAKayx, paripUNaveMba lakaSxNa, anAdi eMba saMjecnx, UdhavxRdikukx, ajapaveVda, AkAraveMba aMga, shudAdhxtamx, parAshakitx, shAMtayxtiVta kale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad sharaNasathxladalilxruvavana vishudidhxcakarxvanunx AkAsha tatatxvXvu sututxvaredide. shabadxvanunx parxdhAna guNavAgi uLaLx AkAsha tatatxvXvu parAshakitxya matotxMdu rUpu; adakekx sadAshivaneV adhideVvate; I cakarxda madhayxdalilx parxsAdaliMgavide; sharaNanu AkAshada parxdhAna guNavanunx sadAshivanige aMdare, parashivana shivana sAdAKayxdalilxruva shorxVtarxveMba bAyige tananx AnaMda tanuvina \hbox{sujAcnxna} hasatxdiMda, sushabadxveMba padAthaRvanunx apiRsi, adanunx sushabadxveMba parxsAdavanAnxgisikoMDu BoVgisutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge sUkaSxmX riVtiyalilx pUjisuva sAdhakananunx sadAshivapUjAriyeMdu kareyalAgutatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I sUkaSxmX pUjeya naMtara sharaNanu vishudidhxcakarxdalilxruva parxsAdaliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu shudAdhxtamxneMdu \hbox{aritu}, A cakarxda UdhavxR dikikxnalilxruva paripUNaRveMba lakaSxNa\-vanUnx, anAdivatf eMba saMjecnxyanUnx, dapaRNAkaqti\-yanUnx, kapoVta vaNaRvanUnx, parxNavanAdavanUnx, anuBavisi AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi vishudidhx cakarxvanunx sututxvarida parAshakitxyu (AkAsha tatatxvXvu) shudadhxvAgi, muMde adu shAMtayx\-tiVta kale enisikoLuLxtatxde; aMtha sAdhakanige ajapaveVda sididhxsu\-tatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad Araneya sathxla : aikayx sathxla, joyxVtirAkaqti, OMkAra parxNama, siMhanAda, AjAcnxcakarx, mANikayxvaNaR; shudadhxtanu, sadABxva hasatx, mahAliMga, haqdayaveMba muKa, samarasa Bakitx. sutaqpitx eMba padAthaR, sutaqpitx eMba parxsAda, mahAdeVva pUjAri, mahAdeVva eMba adhideVvate, mahAsAdAKayx aKaMDaveMba lakaSxNa, mahaveMba saMjecnx, pAtALa dikukx, gAyatirxV veVda, Atamxne liMga, jAcnxnAtamx, cicaCxkitx, shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra kale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad aikayxsathxladalilxruva shudadhx tanuvinalilx AjAcnxcakarxvidudx, adakekx AtamxvishAvxsaveV parxdhAna; AtamxtatatxvXvu citfshakitxya matotxMdu rUpa. adakekx mahAdeVvane adhideVvate; I cakarxda madhayxdalilx mahAliMgavide; aikayxnu Atamxda parxdhAnaguNavanunx mahAdeVvanige aMdare parashivana mahAsAdAKayxdalilxruva haqdayaveMba bAyige sadABxvaveMba hasatxdiMda sutaqpitx\-yeMba padAthaRvananxpiRsi, sutaqpitxyeMba parxsAdavanunx paDedu BoVgisutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge sUkaSxmX riVtiyalilx pUje mADuva sAdhakanige mahAdeVva pUjAri eMdu hesaru.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I sUkaSxmX pUjeya naMtara aikayxnu AjAcnx cakarxdalilxruva mahA\-liMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu jAcnxnAtamxneMbudanunx aritu, A cakarxda pAtALa dikikxnalilxruva aKaMDaveMba lakaSxNa\-vanUnx, maha eMba saMjecnxyanUnx, joyxVtirAkaqtiyanUnx, mANikayx vaNaRvanUnx, siMhanAdavanUnx, anuBavisi AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi, AjAcnx cakarxvanunx sututxvarida citfshakitxyu (AtamxtatatxvXvu) shudadhxvAgi, muMde adu shAMtayxtiVtoVtatxra kale enisikoLuLxtatxde.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad bahaLaSuTx vacanakAraru keVvala Aru sathxlagaLu, Aru cakarxgaLu, Aru liMgagaLu, Aru shakitxgaLu, itAyxdigaLanunx heVLidare, kelavaru ivugaLa saMKeyxyanunx oMbatatxkekxVrisutAtxre.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad ELaneya sathxla: niHkaLaMka sathxla, niHkalAkaqti, bakAra parxNama, BarxmaranAda, barxhamxcakarx, joyxVtivaRNaR, cidUrxpatanu, savxtaMtarx hasatx, niHkaLaMka liMga, barxhamxraMdharxmuKa, sadABxva Bakitx, paramAnaMda padAthaR, paramAnaMda parxsAda, shirxVguru \hbox{pUjAri}; parameVshavxraneMba adhideVvate, agamayx sAdAKayx, anAmaya\-veMba lakaSxNa, aparxmANaveMba saMjecnx, haqtakxmalaveMba dikukx, dhanuveVRda, citUsxyaRne aMga, mahaveMba Atamx, nirA\-laMba shakitx, nivaRMcaka kale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad niHkalaMka sathxladalilxruvavana cidUrxpa tanuvinalilx barxhamxcakarxvidudx, adakekx citfsUyaRneV aMga; sUyaRtatatxvXvu nirAlaMba \hbox{shakitxya} matotxMdu rUpa; adakekx shirxVguru adhideVvate; I cakarxdalilx niHkaLaMka liMgavide; niSakxLaMka sAdhakanu, shirxVguru (aMdare agamayxsAdAKayxda barxhamxraMdharx eMba bAyige), paramAnaMda\-veMba padAthaRvanunx savxtaMtarx hasatxdiMda apiRsi, paramAnaMda\-veMba parxsAdavanunx paDedu BoVgisutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge pUjisuvavanige shirxVguru (parameVshavxra) pUjAri eMdu hesaru.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I sUkaSxmX pUjeya naMtara niHkala sAdhakanu barxhamxcakarxdalilxruva niHkalaliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu maha\-veMba AtamxveMdu aritu, A cakarxda haqtakxmala dikikxnalilxruva anAmayaveMba lakaSxNavanUnx, aparxmANaveMba saMjecnx\-yanUnx, joyxVtivaRNaRvanUnx, BarxmaranAdavanUnx anuBavisi, AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi, barxhamxcakarxvanunx sututxvarida nirA\-laMba shakitxyu shudadhxvAgi nivaRMcaka kaleyenisikoLuLxtatxve. A sAdhakanige dhanuveVRda sididhxsutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad eMTaneya sathxla: nirAlaMba (nishUshxnayxsathxla), nishUshxnAyxkaqti, kaSxkAra parxNama, divayxnAda, shiKAcakarx, mahAjoyxVtivaRNaR, cinamxya tanu, nirALa hasatx, shUnayxliMga, unamxni muKa, nira\-haMkAra Bakitx, paripUNaR padAthaR, paripUNaR parxsAda, parashiva pUjAri, parashivanadhideVvate, aviraLasAdAKayx, agamayx\-veMba lakaSxNa, nimARyaveMba saMjecnx, GoVSaveMba dikukx, manoVlaRya veVda, citfcaMdarxne aMga, divAyxtamx, niBArxMta shakitx, anaMta kale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad nirAlaMba sathxladalilxruvavana cinamxyatanuvinalilx shiKAcakarxvidudx, adakekx caMdarx tatatxvXveV aMga; caMdarxtatatxvXvu niBArxMta shakitxya \hbox{matotxMdu} rUpa; adakekx parashivaneV adhideVvate; I cakarxdalilx shUnayx\-liMgavide; nirAlaMba sathxlada sAdhakanu parashivanige (aMdare, aviraLasAdAKayxda unamxni eMba bAyige), paripUNaR padAthaR\-vanunx, nirALa hasatxdiMda apiRsi, paripUNaR parxsAdavanunx paDedu BoVgisutAtxne. parashivananunx hiVge pUjisuvavanige parashivapUjAri eMdu hesaru.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I sUkaSxmX pUjeya naMtara nirAlaMba sathxlada sAdhakanu shiKAcakarxdalilxruva shUnayxliMgavanunx dhAyxnisi, alilxruva tAnu divAyxtamx\-neMdaritu, A cakarxda GoVSaveMba dikikxnalilxruva \hbox{agamayx} lakaSxNavanUnx, nimARyeyeMba saMjecnxyanUnx, mahAjoyxVtivaRNaRvanUnx, divayxnAdavanUnx anuBavisi AnaMdisutAtxne. idariMdAgi shiKAcakarxda niBArxMta shakitxyu shudadhxvAgi, anaMtakaleyenisikoLuLxtatxde. I sathxlada sAdhakanige manoVlaRyaveVda sididhxsutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad oMbatatxne sathxla: nirAtaMka sathxla; niraMjanAkaqti, hakAra \hbox{parxNama}, mahAnAda, pashicxma cakarx, aKaMDajoyxVtivaRNaR, nimuRkitx tanu, nimARya hasatx, niraMjana liMga, pashicxma eMba muKa, aparxmANa Bakitx, aviraLa padAthaR, aviraLa parxsAda, parameVshavxra pUjAri, parameVshavxranadhideVvate; nishacxla sAdAKayx, nivaRMcaka eMba lakaSxNa, aviraLa saMjecnx, nirALa dikukx, agamayx veVda, shivayoVgiyeV aMga, cinamxyAtamx, niravaya shakitx, anaMta kale.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad nirAtaMka sathxladalilxruvavana nimuRkitx tanuvinalilx pashicxma cakarxvidudx, adaralilx niraMjana liMgavide. I sathxlada sAdhakanu tananx nimARyaveMba hasatxdiMda I cakarxda adhideVvateyAda parameVshavxranige, aMdare avana nishacxlasAdAKayxda pashicxma eMba bAyige, aviraLa padAthaRvanunx apiRsi, aviraLa parxsAdavanunx paDedu, BoVgisutAtxne; hAgU A cakarxdalilxruva parameVshavxrananunx kuritu dhAyxnisi, sAkASxtakxrisikoMDAga, alilx nivaRMcaka eMba lakaSxNa, aviraLaveMba saMjecnx aKaMDa mahAjoyxVtivaRNaRvanunx kANutAtxne hAgU mahAnAda keVLisutatxde. idariMda avana niravayashakitx shudadhxvAgi anaMta kaleyenisikoLuLxvudalalxde, sAdhakanige agamayxveVda sididhxsutatxde.}}
\medskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad I oMbatutx sathxlagaLalilx sAdhakanu toVrisuva Bakitxge karxmavAgi; sharxdAdhxBakitx, niSAThxBakitx, avadhAnaBakitx, anuBAvaBakitx, AnaMdaBakitx, samarasaBakitx, sadABxvaBakitx, nirahaMkAraBakitx, aparxmANaBakitx eMba hesarive.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad inUnxrA hadinAru sakiVlagaLa sidAdhxMtadalilx kANuva aMshaveVneMdare, idaralilx yAvoMdU sUthxlavalalx (iMdirxyagoVcaravalalx); rUpu, rasa, gaMdha eMba viSayAdigaLU saha sUkaSxmXve. avugaLanunx apiRsuva \hbox{subudidhx} itAyxdi hasatxgaLU sUkaSxmXve; avugaLanunx sivxVkarisuva liMgagaLu, adhideVvategaLu, pUjArigaLu, cakarxgaLu, shakitxgaLu, BakitxgaLu elalxvU sUkaSxmXve. yAvudeV vayxkitx keVvala rUpavoMdanenxV (gaMdhavanUnx shabadxvanUnx biTuTx) apiRsalu sAdhayxvilalx. elalx apaRNeyU mAnasika. sAdhakanu `nAnu kANutitxruva rUpa\-vanunx ninage apiRsutitxdedxVne' eMdu mAnasikavAgi apiRsabahudeV horatu, oMdu haNaNxnunx neYveVdayx mADidaMte rUpa\-voMdanenxV athavA matAtxvudeV viSayavanenxV liMgApiRta mADalu sAdhayxvilalx.}}
\smallskip
\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad alalxde, `nAnu BakatxsathxladalilxdedxVne, nAnu guruliMgavanunx pUjisa\-bAradu, AcAraliMgavananxSeTxV pUjisabeVku' eMdAgali, `nAnu gaMdhavananxpiRsabeVkeV horatu, shabadxvananxpiRsabAradu' eMdAgali yAva sAdhakanU nidhaRrisalu sAdhayxvilalx. Adare, gaMdhayukatx vasutxgaLanunx iMdu, rasayukatx vasutxvanunx nALe, hiVge apiRsalu (tAyxga mADalu) sAdhayxvide. adeV riVti cakarxgaLalilxruva liMgavanunx haMtahaMtavAgi kuritu dhAyxnisalu sAdhayxvide. oMdeV liMga Aru liMgaveMba viBajane heVge mAnasikavoV hAgeyeV apaRNe, parxsAda, shakitx, Bakitx, muKa, hasatx itAyxdigaLU mAnasikaveV. Adare oMdu cakarxvanunx jAgarxta\-goLisidAga, alilxruva liMga, alilxruva shakitx itAyxdigaLu kirxyAshiVlavAgive eMdu nAvu takiRsutetxVve.}}

\ullekha{urutararahasayxdoLagoVMkAraveV kaNA parashivaM baLikA yakArave sadAshivaM parikisalu vAkAraviVshaM shikAraveV rudarxM makAraveraDu varabiMduviM viSuNxvA nakAraM ...barxhamxM (viVsheYpu. 1-5-55); SaTasxthXlabarxhamxmUtiRgaLu - oMdoMdu sAdAKayxkekx obobxbabx adhideVvategaLirutAtxre. parashivana savxrUpagaLeV ivaru eMdu heVLabahudu... 1. parashiva athavA sharaNa jaMgama athavA Atamx, 2. sadAshiva, 3. shiva, 4. rudarx, 5. viSuNx, 6. barxhamx (\hbox{shivAkoV.} 21-25).}

\meaning{\artha{parashivana aidu muKagaLalilx pashicxma dikikxna muKa. sadoyxVjAta muKadiMda janisida naMdA eMba hasuvina goVmayadiMda viBUtiyanunx tayArisalAgutatxde. parashivana I muKadiMdaleV reVNuka eMba shivana gaNeVshavxranu janisidanu:}}

\smallskip
\begin{shl}

\newmeaning{\arthanonum{\qquad shiva matutx shakitxgaLa saMbaMdha hiVgiruvudariMda parxpaMcada saqSiTxge beVkAguvudu parashivana iceCx mAtarx. avanu iciCxsida kUDale avanalilxyeV avayxkatxvAgi aDagidadx shakitxyu vikAsavAgalu pArxraMBavAgutatxde. shakitxvikAsavu oMdu karxmavananxnusarisutatxde. vacana\-kArara I parikalapxneyanunx sUthxlavAgi hiVge maMDisabahudu. modalu parashivanu tAnobabxneV irutAtxne.
